long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Why pay more when you can pay less? this extension will let you know if there's a better deal out there.

How it works:
- When you're on the checkout page of any of the serviced websites, the extension will work behind the scenes to check if there are other deals for the restaurant you are ordering from, and will show a popup with the deals information if available.
- Serviced websites are: doordash, ubereats, postmates, grubhub, delivery.com, eatstreet
